name: Farciminis Infernum
description:
Introduction

You are surrounded!

The evil sausage cultists are after you. They come from the towers.

Objective

Survive as many floors as you can by destroying all your ennemies.Destroy all the monsters in the arena, then destroy the chains to go deeper and deeper in this infamous adventure. Focus on the towers to destroy the evil from the source

Install

Unzip the archive and launch "Farciminis Infernum.exe".

Controls

Use WASD/ZQSD or Left Stick to move.
Use your mouse or Right Stick to look around.
Use Spacebar or A/Cross to jump.
Use Left Mouse or RT/R2 to shoot.

Use Escape or Start to open the pause menu.
